channel.title: Chest help
channel.description:
ok im making my gsmini but when u kill the final npc and he drops a key for the chest which u get a gs from, but i dont know how to make the key work with the chest to get the gs if anyone can tell me how to use the key with the chest to get gs would be great
thx ~~slevins~~
Edit: nvm everybody i worked out how to make the chest work but i need to know how to make it give only 1 of the 4gs's at random :confused: Edit2: nvm again i worked it all out by myself and i know have a gsmini :D
